name: Trial by Dice
description:
Trial by Dice is a calm, isometric puzzle game made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam using the theme "Roll of the Dice".

In this game, your goal is to get to the green square in each level by moving up, down, left, and right with either WASD or the arrow keys.

However, each time you move, the number of spaces you roll is determined by the number on the top of the die. This simple twist adds tons of depth to the game and allows levels that look simple to be mind-bendingly difficult.

The music and sound effects were all made from scratch during the jam.

I hope you enjoy my entry! See if you can beat all 10 levels!

Packages Used:

Bubble Font (Free Version) - Jazz Create Games

Fog Plane - LMHPoly & Cyanilux
